Html:
Hi Guys,
I really do love PHPExcel, it allows me process data from other departments quickly and easily.

One problem I have found is the command I need to open a password protected spreadsheet? This is when opening a Excel 2007 version of a spreadsheet.

Kind regards,
-Chris

I have now posted this in the issue tracker as a proposed feature:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=9101

I believe it may be difficult to solve and not be coming in the near future in PHPExcel. But we will have to let Maarten judge!
